content: the sassy autumn hat is a free crochet pattern on my blog this crochet ribbed hat is worked from the top down working the very textured ribbed front and back post double_crochet stitches throughout the crown of the hat works the increases evenly around while still trying to keep the back and front post stitch pattern throughout once you get to the main body of the hat you will be working front and back post stitches without increases - really easy the flap section is created by working additional chains at the beginning of a row and you will no longer be joining at the end of each round instead we begin working turned row throughout the remainder of the hat add a decorative large button to your hat for the perfect finish the ribbing stitch on this hat makes it very stretchy and very forgiving on fit adult small 8 height x 9 width adult medium 8 height x 10 width
